    • Method Detail

      • caze

        public Match.Builder<R> caze(Functions.λ1<?,R> function)
        Use this method to match by object type T. An object o matches this case, if o != null && T isAssignableFrom o.getClass().
        Parameters:
        function - A Function which is applied to a matched object.
        Returns:
        this, the current instance of Match.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if function is null.

      • caze

        public <T> Match.Builder<R> caze(T prototype,
                                 Functions.λ1<T,R> function)
        Use this method to match by prototype value of object type T. An object o matches this case, if prototype == o || (prototype != null && prototype.equals(o)).
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the object to be matched
        Parameters:
        prototype - An object to be matched by equality as defined above.
        function - A Function which is applied to a matched object.
        Returns:
        this, the current instance of Match.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if function is null.

      • caze

        public Match.Builder<R> caze(Functions.BooleanFunction<R> function)

        Parameters:
        function - A BooleanFunction which is applied to a matched object.
        Returns:
        this, the current instance of Match.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if function is null.
